description:
He was said to have been 'humiliated' after being dumped in the midst of their very public love affair.据说在这次被甩让他备感屈辱，因为这段恋情一直处于公众视野中。

But now friends of Tom Hiddleston have come forward to claim it was in fact he who decided to give Taylor Swift the flick as he had grown 'tired of her.'但是现在抖森的朋友挺身辩称实际上是他提出与霉霉分手，因为他“受够了她”。

Indeed the 35-year-old Thor star is said to be so fickle with women that he dumps them all with monotonous regularity, a development which led his associates christening the time frame as 'the three month rule.'的确，这位35岁《雷神》影星在女人问题上被指用情不专，他每次提出分手甚至还有无聊的规律可寻，认识他的人戏称这种时间模式为“3个月规则”。

Team Taylor had mooted the idea that she decided to get rid of Tom after he demanded she walk the Emmys red carpet with him, in what would appear to be a transparent attempt to boost his career.霉霉团队则表示，在抖森提出让霉霉与他在艾美奖典礼一起走红毯后，她就决定离开他，因为他借机提升自己事业的意图太明显了。

But the friend said: 'Tom drifted from her and it had nothing to do with her being put off by the publicity.'It’s more to do with the fact he’s a commitment-phobewho gets bored very easily.'但这位朋友则说，"抖森离开她与宣传对她的影响无关，跟他是个非常易于感到厌烦的承诺恐惧症患者更有关系。”

His pal said: 'Even his sisters affectionately chide him on his lack of relationship staying power.'他的朋友还说，“甚至他的姐姐都亲切的责骂他没有恋爱持久力。”

Despite his decision, Tom was looking miserable as he enjoyed a coffee with some friends in Australia on Wednesday.尽管是他的决定，周三时与朋友在澳洲喝咖啡被拍到时，抖森看起来很糟糕。

By way of contrast, Taylor was pictured grinning and holding her head up high as she headed to the gym in New York that same day. 相比之下，同一天霉霉在纽约前往健身房被拍到时却是昂着头，笑容满面。

之前说的是霉霉甩的抖森，现在又出现的神转折，这个谁甩的谁真的那么重要吗……反正英语君表示目测撕逼已开场，新歌已上路~等着瞧咯~
